Translations.Text: Do GOD belongs buduci z heavens zem! Mat rad daleko mat rad He zaujem koniec z world (Hodiny) bol zmurkat oci away vecer koniec. GOD bol Omnipotent
GOD brought ONA TVOJ MATKA BRUCHO ZAUZLIT nothing He DAT ONA hearing eyesight INTELIGENCIA ONA bol appreciative
they nie see birds robit committed letiet atmosphere sky Ziaden holds them v the air GOD This bol (sufficient) proof ludia verit

GOD zadovazit for ona stationary domov ona zivy. He zadovazit for ona kufrikovy domov robit zatajit zivy inventar ona pouzivat them when ona cestovat when ona zaplatit nadol. Z ich wools furs chlp ona robit zariadenie luxuries awhile

GOD zadovazit for ona zaclonit things He created zadovazit for ona zastita mountains zadovazit for ona garments chranit ona kurenie garments ze chranit when ona boj do vojnovy! He thus zdokonalit Jeho blessings ona ze ona submit
they still turn potom tvoj chodidlo mission je zretelny delivery (z odkaz)
They fully recognize GOD's blessings potom zapierat them; majority z them bol disbelievers
